/usr/bin/clang++ -fPIC  -DBOOST_LOG_DYN_LINK -std=c++17 -g  -shared -Wl,-soname,libdecoder_plugin_ffmpeg.so -o libdecoder_plugin_ffmpeg.so CMakeFiles/decoder_plugin_ffmpeg.dir/core/decoder_plugins_manager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/decoder_plugin_ffmpeg.dir/core/config.cpp.o CMakeFiles/decoder_plugin_ffmpeg.dir/plugins/decoder_plugins/decoder_plugin_ffmpeg.cpp.o -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lboost_log -ldl -lavcodec -lavutil -lavformat -pthread
